mapper.select:
SELECT S.seq , S.sale_date AS saleDate , S.sale_flag AS saleFlag , S.fabric_seq AS fabricSeq , F.fabric_no AS fabricNo , F.fabric_name AS fabricName , S.section , S.color , S.fabric_count AS fabricCount , S.deduction , S.unit , S.price , S.tax , S.delivery , S.receivable , S.etc , S.order_no AS orderNo , M.name AS registerName , S.register_id AS registerId , S.register_date AS registerDate FROM sales S INNER JOIN member M ON S.register_id = M.id INNER JOIN fabric F ON S.fabric_seq = F.seq WHERE 1 = 1
AND S.sale_date BETWEEN CONCAT(#{startDate}, ' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{finishDate}, ' 00:00:00')
ORDER BY S.sale_date ASC
